import { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import Footer from "./Footer" import Nav from "./Nav" import "./cart.css" function Cart(){ const [localdata,setlocaldata] = useState([]) const [items,setitems] = useState(localdata.length) useEffect(()=>{ var existing = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("cartdata")); console.log(existing) var mapfirst = existing.map(e => e[0] || e); setlocaldata(mapfirst) setlocaldata(mapfirst) },[]) console.log(localdata,"kl") return( <>

.

))}

) } export default Cart;
